argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_xmetf | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> D : ( X X. X ) --> RR* ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fdm | |- ( D : ( X X. X ) --> RR* -> dom D = ( X X. X ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_metreslem | |- ( dom D = ( X X. X ) -> ( D |` ( R X. R ) ) = ( D |` ( ( X i^i R ) X. ( X i^i R ) ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_3syl | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( D |` ( R X. R ) ) = ( D |` ( ( X i^i R ) X. ( X i^i R ) ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_inss1 | |- ( X i^i R ) C_ X |
| 6 |  | #P_xmetres2 | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ ( X i^i R ) C_ X ) -> ( D |` ( ( X i^i R ) X. ( X i^i R ) ) ) e. ( *Met ` ( X i^i R ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( D |` ( ( X i^i R ) X. ( X i^i R ) ) ) e. ( *Met ` ( X i^i R ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( D |` ( R X. R ) ) e. ( *Met ` ( X i^i R ) ) ) |
